subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: On her way to all four major titles that year, Steffi Graf won the French Open final, 6-0, 6-0. Serena Williams, who won her semifinal 6-0, 6-1, faces Maria Sharapova on Saturday.
snippet: On her way to all four major titles that year, Steffi Graf won the French Open final, 6-0, 6-0. Serena Williams, who won her semifinal 6-0, 6-1, faces Maria Sharapova on Saturday.
